actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to permit certain State taxation of persons in air commerce.

summary.text: Authorizes State taxation of persons in air commerce under the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to carry out any environmental improvement project designed to abate aircraft noise, or air or water pollution, directly or indirectly related to aircraft operations at the airport where such taxes are levied and collected.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to permit certain State taxation of persons in air commerce.
